body:
In #18394 it was noted, that this package should be changed from a generic "Package" to a "CMakePackage". It makes a bunch of things easier.

And it uses all the common cmake code.

pinging @adamjstewart who asked about this conversion in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/18394#issuecomment-683339463
title: glew: Refactor as CMakePackage
